alert.note: Alert for Clay; East Otter Tail; Grant; West Otter Tail; Wilkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 3:04PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Impacts from snow and blowing snow are expected Tuesday night into Wednesday... Snowfall and gusty northeast winds are expected along and south of the Interstate 94 corridor Tuesday night into Wednesday. General snowfall amounts of 2 to 6 inches are expected within this area, although there is a potential for smaller bands of greater than 6 inches within this area. Snow rates could also become heavy at times, resulting in very low visibilities even without considering the gusty northeast winds. However, there is still uncertainty in where the highest snow totals will be, as they could still shift further north or south. Therefore, stay tuned for updates on this system.

area.areaDesc: Clay; East Otter Tail; Grant; West Otter Tail; Wilkin
